Name: The Wanderer
About the game: Post-nuclear atmosphere and turn-based combat. Key Features: EXPLORE AND SURVIVE! An atmospheric open world to explore. Deadly lakes, rotten deserts and dangerous hills! Dark & beautiful hand-drawn flora & fauna. Hand-painted textures. TURN-BASED BATTLES! An army of rescued cats and dogs helps your quest on hex based battle maps. Slay stylish roamers and collect the teeth of the mutants in the underground. Mutant teeth - the currency of the wastes. Buy random weapons with game-play changing powers. Thousands of possible combinations. LOOT! Boomboxes, cassettes, Grobo beer bottles. Find and collect hidden items to gain the edge in the underground battles. Art by Roland Seer, programming by Rain Pohlak.
Meta Title: The Wanderer: Jan 25, 2019, Cult Software and Full Overview
